title: 50% off champions aren't really 50% off?
body:
Hi there, 

So I saw 2 cool champs that are 50% off in the store, however, the price is still the same. 

https://puu.sh/zeUTh/e4d48dd907.png

{{champion:154}} {{champion:133}} {{champion:80}} {{champion:115}}  should be on sales, However their prices are still the same as shown in the image above. I'd really love to buy these champs, but cannot buy them on half price!! :(


EDIT: Seems like they are 50% off via RP but not BE. You should state that it's for RP only, because that 50% champ bundle that happened 2 weeks ago was 50% off for both RP and BE... I got really excited here.

replies.body:
The norm for sales is RP only. The BE sales are only for special events (the recent one was for the season start).

It's also not so explicitly stated in the sale announcement post (only RP prices are shown):
https://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/champion-and-skin-sale-0202-0602?utm_source=LeagueClient&utm_medium=NewsTier3Pos6
